descriptionHtml:
[size=4][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-2-1415204646.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-4-1415204646.jpg[/img]
This MOD adds a standalone follower.
[/size]

[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][Requirements][/size][/color][/b]
 > Skyrim Ver 1.9.32.0+
 > graphics settings Medium+ or
    Setting to "iTexMipMapSkip=0" in "SkyrimPrefs.ini"
    [color=#ff0000](In a Low setting, the texture of hair and eyes becomes an abnormal display. )[/color]
 

[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][Installation][/size][/color][/b]
 > The installation of this MOD recommends NMM or Mod Organizer.
 > This MOD is being offered by the Fomod Installer. it is possible to choose body type from UNP, CBBE, seveNBase.
 > V2 can be installed simultaneously with V1.


[size=4][b][color=#b6d7a8][Recommended Mods][/color]
[/b][/size][size=2]  Any of the follower overhaul mods.
  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288  [color=#ff0000](This is very important!)[/color]
  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk [color=#ff0000] ([/color][color=#ff0000]Strongly recommended!)[/color]

  I [size=2]use The [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56020/?][size=2]AIR ENB[/size][/url][size=2] to take screenshots.[/size]


[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][Change Log][/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]  1.00 -> 1.01
[size=2]    [/size]Add "seveNBase" body type.
  1.01 -> 1.02
[size=2]    [/size]The Min Lv in all follower adjusted to 5, and the Max Lv adjusted to 120. 
[size=2]    [/size]Unnecessary Perk in each follower deleted and Some Perk added.
  1.02 -> 1.03
[size=2]    [/size]Changed of CombatStyle. Changed AI of "Waiting" and "Follow"
[size=2]    [/size]Fixed the HeadPos of Followers.
  1.03 -> 1.04
    Fixed bug in the Face of Kaarina of Single Install Version.
[size=2]    [/size]Fixed the value of the "Confidence" of Followers.  "Cowardly" -> "Foolhardy"
[size=2]  1.04 -> 1.10
  2.00 -> 2.10
    added a new own magic to mediocre bow and melee character.
      V1:Vera --- Elemental Fury(MagicVer, Duration 40 s,  delay time 20 s)
           Kaarina --- self-attack damage up buff (Duration 6 s,  delay time 45 s)
      V2:Vera --- Self-reinforcing buff (Duration 30 s,  delay time 120 s)
           Irene --- Frenzy(adjustment ver), SpeedUp buff.
[size=2]  1.10 -> 1.20
[/size][size=2]  2.10 -> 2.20[/size][/size][/size]
[size=2]      [/size]V1:Irene --- Fixed forehead of V1 Irene.
                        Magic of V1 Irene was replaced. 
                        Unique magic such as magic of the Rapid-fire type　and the Area type magic (not friendly fire) is added.
                        Add summoning magic of mini Dragon Priest.
      V2:Irene --- Enlarge effect range of Frenzy of V2 Irene.
                        improved the speed-up buff of V2 Irene. Buff came to be adapted to the power attack of Dual Weapons.
[size=2]  2.20 -> 2.30
[/size][size=2]      [/size][size=2]V2:kaarina --- [/size]Add Conjure Floating skull magic to V2 Kaarina.
[size=2]                       [/size]    Floating skull will barrage the energy bullets from middle distance.
[size=2]      [/size][size=2]V2:Vera --- Abolished the buff of V2 Vera, add the magic sword to grant flame.
                       Effect of magic sword to explode every time of attack, and cause Flame damage to enemies around the own.
                       There is also a slight attack speed-up effect.
                       Change to a Close-Quarters style the combat style from long-range style.[/size]

[/size]
[size=4][b][color=#b6d7a8][Character][/color]
Ver1-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-1-1414572429.jpg[/img]
[/b][/size][size=3][size=2]  [color=#ea9999][size=3][b]Vera[/b][/size][/color]
  Location : Winking Skeever Inn, [size=2]Solitude
  Class : Warrior (One-handed or Two-handed, block, heavy-armor or Light-armor)
  Spell : Elemental Fury(MagicVer, Duration 40 s,  delay time 20 s)
  
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-4-1414572401.jpg[/img]
[/size][/size][size=2]  [/size][size=3][b][color=#ea9999]Kaarina[/color][/b]
[/size][size=2]  Location : Sleeping Giant, Riverwood
[/size][size=2]  Class : Archer (Archery, [size=2] Light-armor, Stealth[/size])
  Spell : self-attack damage up buff (Attack power greatly Up, defense Up, Duration 6 s,  delay time 45 s)

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-5-1414572401.jpg[/img]
[size=2]  [/size][size=3][b][color=#ea9999]Irene[/color][/b]
[/size][size=2]  Location : The Frozen Hearth, Winterhold
[/size][size=2]  Class : Mage (Destruction-magics, [size=2] Restoration-magics, Light-armor[/size])
  Spell : Flames, Frostbite, Firebolt, IceSpike, Incinerate, IcySpear,
            LesserWard, FastHealing, Conjure FlameAtronach FrostAtronach

[size=4]Ver2-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-3-1414572401.jpg[/img]
[size=2] [b] [/b][/size][color=#ea9999][size=3][b]Vera[/b][/size][/color]
[size=2]  Location : Frostfruit Inn, Rorikstead[/size][size=2]
  Class : Ranger ([size=2]Archery[/size], Two-handed, heavy-armor)
  Spell : Self-reinforcement buff (Attack, Defense, BowSpeed slightly Up, Duration 30 s,  delay time 120 s)
  
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-1-1414572401.jpg[/img]
[/size][size=2]  [/size][size=3][b][color=#ea9999]Kaarina[/color][/b]
[/size][size=2]  Location : Dragonsreach, Whiterun
[/size][size=2]  Class : [size=2]Mage[/size] ([size=2]Destruction-magics, [/size][size=2] Conjuration-magics, Restoration-magics,[/size])
  Spell : BoundSword(Enhanced ver), LesserWard, Firebolt, FireboltStorm, Incinerate,
            Conjure FlameAtronach, Flame Thrall

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58329-2-1414572401.jpg[/img]
[size=2][b] [color=#ea9999] [/color][/b][/size][size=3][b][color=#ea9999]Irene[/color]
[/b][/size][size=2]  Location : Dead Mans Drink, [size=2]Falkreath[/size]
[/size][size=2]  Class : Assassin ([size=2]One-handed(Dual)[/size][size=2], Light-armor, Stealth[/size])
  Spell : Frenzy(adjustment ver), SpeedUp buff (Righthand Attack speed, Movement speed Up)[/size][/size]
[/size]
 
[/size][/size][/size]
[size=4][b][color=#b6d7a8][Credits][/color][/b][b]
[/b][size=2]  [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/][size=2]Enhance Character Edit[/size][/url][size=2] by tktk

  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente

author: pikona

files.name: GCE Followers V1-Vera
files.changelogHtml:
added a new own magic to mediocre bow and melee character.
V1
Vera > Elemental Fury(MagicVer, Duration 40 s, delay time 20 s)
Kaarina > self-attack damage up buff (Duration 6 s, delay time 45 s)

files.name: GCE Followers V1-Kaarina
files.changelogHtml:
added a new own magic to mediocre bow and melee character.
V1
Vera > Elemental Fury(MagicVer, Duration 40 s, delay time 20 s)
Kaarina > self-attack damage up buff (Duration 6 s, delay time 45 s)

files.name: GCE Followers V2-Vera
files.changelogHtml:
added a new own magic to mediocre bow and melee character.
V2
Vera > Self-reinforcing buff (Duration 30 s, delay time 120 s)
Irene > Frenzy(adjustment ver), SpeedUp buff.

files.name: GCE Followers V1 All-In-One Installer
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed forehead of V1 Irene.
Magic of V1 Irene was replaced. Unique magic such as magic of the Rapid-fire type　and the Area type magic (not friendly fire) is added. Add summoning magic of mini Dragon Priest.

files.name: GCE Followers V1-Irene
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed forehead of V1 Irene.
Magic of V1 Irene was replaced. Unique magic such as magic of the Rapid-fire type　and the Area type magic (not friendly fire) is added. Add summoning magic of mini Dragon Priest.

files.name: GCE Followers V2 All-In-One Installer
files.changelogHtml:
Enlarge effect range of Frenzy of V2 Irene.
improved the speed-up buff of V2 Irene. Buff came to be adapted to the power attack of Dual Weapons.

files.name: GCE Followers V2-Irene
files.changelogHtml:
Enlarge effect range of Frenzy of V2 Irene.
improved the speed-up buff of V2 Irene. Buff came to be adapted to the power attack of Dual Weapons.

files.name: GCE Followers V2 All-In-One Installer
files.changelogHtml:
Abolished the buff of V2 Vera, add the magic sword to grant flame.
Effect of magic sword to explode every time of attack, and cause Flame damage to enemies around the own. There is also a slight
attack speed-up effect.
Change to a Close-Quarters style the combat style from long-range style.

Add Conjure Floating skull magic to V2 Kaarina.
Floating skull will barrage the energy bullets from middle distance.

files.name: GCE Followers V2-Vera
files.changelogHtml:
Abolished the buff of V2 Vera, add the magic sword to grant flame.
Effect of magic sword to explode every time of attack, and cause Flame damage to enemies around the own. There is also a slight
attack speed-up effect.
Change to a Close-Quarters style the combat style from long-range style.

Add Conjure Floating skull magic to V2 Kaarina.
Floating skull will barrage the energy bullets from middle distance.
